name: Stability
description:
Stability is a puzzle game where you should safely land a rocket overcoming different obstacles. Be aware of lazers, solve puzzles, take care of fuel level and your speed.

▪ Variety of locations
▪ Nice music
▪ Bargain price
▪ Steam achievements

Coming soon:
▪ Steam trading cards

Controls:
▪ Move - keyboard arrows
▪ Restart - R on a keyboard
▪ Menu - Esc

Thanks to ZloyCrek for the assistance with saving system development.
